alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 18 at 3:35AM EST until January 18 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 12 to 22 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Snowfall rates may reach 3 to 4 inches per hour this morning in the most intense band. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. The greatest additional accumulations will be across southern Jefferson County and the northern Tug Hill Plateau. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible in the lake effect snow band with deep snow cover on roads and very poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute today. Travel along Interstate 81 will be severely impacted between Watertown and Pulaski.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
